entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Rain showers and flurries beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to snow in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
